data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 2, Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Moreira de Conegos, Tondela push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Tondela at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Throw-in Moreirense.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Tondela throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Tondela drive upfield and Jonathan Rubio gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Moreirense defender.
In the minute 8, Free kick Tondela.
Tondela attack but Yohan Tavares's header doesn't find the target.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Throw-in for Moreirense close to the penalty box.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Moreirense, close to Tondela's area.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Moreirense have a dangerous throw-in.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Tondela at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 16, Luther Singh for Moreirense drives towards goal at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Throw-in for Tondela at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 17, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho waits before resuming play because Philipe Sampaio for Tondela is still down.
Attention is being given to Moreirenseâ€™s Steven Vitoria and play has been suspended briefly.
Steven Vitoria is back on his feet again.
In the minute 19, Throw-in high up the field for Tondela in Moreira de Conegos.
Philipe Sampaio returns to the field for Tondela after picking up a slight injury.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Can Tondela capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Moreirense's half?
Tondela drives forward and Jonathan Rubio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 25, Moreirense needs to be cautious. Tondela have an attacking throw-in.
Tondela push upfield but Luis Miguel Branco Godinho quickly pulls them for offside.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Tondela.
Jonathan Rubio (Tondela) gets a yellow card.
Luther Singh (Moreirense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 30, Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
In the minute 32, In Moreira de Conegos, Jonathan Rubio (Tondela) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Tondela.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tondela have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 40, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 42, Tondela have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Tondela push forward at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas and Joao Jaquite gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Moreirense defence.
Fahd Moufi (Tondela) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 43, Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
An attacking Tondela player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 44, Abdu Conte (Moreirense) has received a first yellow card.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho blows to end the first-half.
Goal! Joao Pedro gives Tondela a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Ricardo Valente is replacing Jonathan Rubio for the away team.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Moreirense.
In the minute 48, Throw-in high up the field for Moreirense in Moreira de Conegos.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Tondela's Philipe Sampaio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Moreirense defender.
In the minute 49, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Moreirense.
In the minute 51, Moreirense are pushing forward but Nuno Valente Santos's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Moreirense.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Tondela.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Moreirense surge into the attack at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas but Fabio Abreuâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moreira de Conegos.
In Moreira de Conegos, Fabio Abreu of Moreirense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 58, Moreirense advance rapidly upfield but Luis Miguel Branco Godinho blows for offside.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Nuno Valente Santos (Moreirense) strikes at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas but his header is cleared.
In the minute 60, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Moreirense throw-in in Tondela's half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Fahd Moufi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tondela.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Tondela.
Filipe Soares is replacing Alex Soares for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
The match at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas has been interrupted briefly for a check on Joao Pedro, who is down injured.
In the minute 65, Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Tondela's Joao Pedro looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Tondela.
Tomislav Strkalj (Tondela) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Tondela make their second substitution with Ronan Jeronimo replacing Tomislav Strkalj.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 69, In Moreira de Conegos Moreirense attack through Filipe Soares. The finish is off target, however.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Tondela a goal kick.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 70, Joao Aurelio gets an equalizer for Moreirense. The score is now 1-1.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Tondela throw-in in Moreirense's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Free kick in a good position for Tondela!
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a throw-in for Tondela, close to Moreirense's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Moreirense close to the penalty box.
Important block from the Tondela defence as Filipe Soares fires in a strike for Moreirense.
Tondela needs to be cautious. Moreirense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 78, Tondela will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Moreirense.
Moreirense's Gabrielzinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tondela defender.
Moreirense's Gabrielzinho goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 80, Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Richard Rodrigues is on a sub for Joao Pedro for Tondela.
Babacar Niasse Mbaye is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 81, Babacar Niasse Mbaye has recovered and rejoins the match in Moreira de Conegos.
Can Tondela capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas, Tondela are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 83, Can Moreirense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tondela's half?
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Moreirense throw-in in Tondela's half.
The home team replace Gabrielzinho with Pedro Nuno.
In the minute 84, Moreirense make their third substitution with Nene replacing Fabio Abreu.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
An attacking Tondela player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
At Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas, Steven Vitoria has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tondela close to the penalty box.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Moreirense.
Tondela's Richard Rodrigues breaks free at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead thanks to a penalty from Pepelu.
Pedro Nuno (Moreirense) has received a yellow card from Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Jhon Murillo is booked for the away team.
Natxo Gonzalez (Tondela) is making a fourth substitution, with Ricardo Alves replacing Jhon Murillo.
